steps.code: const tasks = []; document.querySelectorAll('.task_list_item, [class*="task_item"]').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 30) { const nameEl = el.querySelector('.task_content, [class*="content"]'); const dueEl = el.querySelector('.due_date, time'); tasks.push({ name: nameEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', due: dueEl?.textContent?.trim() || '' }); } }); return { task_count: tasks.length, tasks };
steps.name: result
steps.label: Extract data
